title: Can't log in
body: So I get to the screen with the username and password. I put both in correctly, but it just sits there and saw "authenticating." I cant even log in... What do I do?

replies.body: same problem, started today after patch. in the morning i played, no problem
EUW & EUNE are currently experiencing login failures and is being worked on at this time.
Its been 4 days with no change this is unacceptable, i been unable to play for 4 days.
yo same problem here today..
EUW & EUNE are currently experiencing login failures and is being worked on at this time.
Its been 4 days with no change this is unacceptable, i been unable to play for 4 days.

We definitely don’t want you to miss the party, so here’s the security pass to the [Login Platform.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues)

http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-4hsbxlb85qU/VRqK0_slEZI/AAAAAAAAnDE/bBjnYxLhpOs/s1600/AmumuLoadScreen_8.png

Experiencing the same. Can't even log into Riot Games properly

If you are experiencing connection issues with the new client you may want to reset your Firewall permissions. This video is a quick guide with links in the description to more detailed guides. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GyJisyEQ248

Is this still an issue?  I've seen a few reports on this, but haven't discovered any issues with the authentication servers.  If this is still happening, go through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is able to reach the authentication server on the new client.  Let me know if you run into any problems.
Same here, couldn't log in with the new client. But with legacy client, it's working.
same here GG riot
